name: Consent Fatigue Scenario
description: Tests user resilience and consent validity when a policy update interrupts a critical workflow.

steps.governance_rule: mandatory policy review before dashboard access
steps.situation: Persona attempts to access their dashboard to perform a time-sensitive action.

steps.governance_rule: display full text of 2000-word policy update
steps.situation: A modal appears blocking the screen. It requires scrolling to the bottom before the 'Accept' button is enabled.

notes: Ensure the 'time_sensitive' context is weighted heavily in the Persona Engine for P1.
